Game Mechanics

Remixed Pixel Dungeon features various unique mechanics that enhance the gameplay experience.

Core Mechanics

  • Necrotism
  • Dual Wielding
  • Shields
  • Equipment Slots
  • Spells
  • Customizations
  • Magic Affinities - Combat, Elemental, Rogue, Huntress, Elf, Necromancy, Witchcraft, Priest, PlagueDoctor
  • Weapon Enchantments - Special abilities that can be applied to weapons
  • Armor Glyphs - Special abilities that can be applied to armor
  • Quickslots - Fast access to items during gameplay

UI Mechanics

  • Handedness Option: UI layout can be switched between right-handed and left-handed configurations for better accessibility

Combat Mechanics

  • Class Armor Abilities
  • Accuracy and Evasion - Attack and defense mechanics
  • Combo System - Special attack bonuses
  • Weapon Enchantments - Special effects on weapons
  • Armor Glyphs - Special effects on armor
  • Status Effects - Various conditions affecting characters
  • Necromancy - Undead summoning and control

Exploration Mechanics

  • Branch Dungeons - Special side areas with unique challenges
  • Challenges - Optional modifiers for increased difficulty
  • Shops - Town and dungeon commerce systems
  • Town Level - Hub area with NPCs and services
  • Keys - Unlocking doors and special areas

Resource Management

  • Hunger System - Food consumption and starvation mechanics
  • Gold Economy - Currency and purchasing system
  • Mana System - Magic resource management (for certain classes)
  • Inventory Weight - Carrying capacity limitations

Character Progression

  • Skill Points - Points for upgrading hero abilities
  • Subclasses - Specialized paths for hero classes
  • Badges - Achievements that unlock special features

See Also

  • Playable Classes
  • Items
  • Enemies
